text:
SriqtAH sa#hasraqSO &vai#ShAq(gm)q hEDa# ImahE || 
aqsau yO# &vaqsarpa#tiq nIla#grIvOq vilO#hitaH | 
uqtainaM# gOqpA a#dRuSaqn-nadRu#San-nudahAqrya#H | 
uqtainaMq ~MviSvA# BUqtAniq sa dRuqShTO mRu#DayAti naH || 				
namO# astuq nIla#grIvAya sahasrAqkShAya# mIqDhuShE$ | 
athOq yE a#syaq satvA#nOq&haM tEByO# &karaqnnama#H || 					
pramuM#caq dhanva#naqstva muqBayOq-rArtni#yOqrjyAM | 
yASca# tEq hastaq iSha#vaqH - [  ] 3
